list.name: ultrasound

list.secretDescription: Encapsulates how ultrasound is used to visualize and understand the intricate forms inside the human body. Whether it's monitoring fetal development, diagnosing conditions in soft tissues, or guiding minimally invasive procedures, ultrasound provides a critical window into the body's internal forms in motion.

list.name: ct

list.secretDescription: highlights the accuracy and reliability of CT scans in providing detailed cross-sectional views of the body, which are crucial for accurate diagnosis (DX) and subsequent treatments, including guiding intricate procedures like biopsies.
